title: (x) Fog of War movie logo - Courier {Patricia Fabricant}
content:
I think I'm going to like this place--   
   
 [http://www.sonyclassics.com/fogofwar/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050824061123/http:/www.sonyclassics.com/fogofwar/)   
   
Logo, very interesting font.
author: rjhunter

comments.content: Looks likely, I didn't even bother too look at courier, due to the hundreds of BAD versions. Thanks patricia.
